snippet: Almost from the time modern Americans discovered Southern California, it has been the ultimate symbol of hope, opportunity and escape: hope for the aged looking for a nice climate in which to retire; opportunity for those on the make; sunny escape...
lead_paragraph: Almost from the time modern Americans discovered Southern California, it has been the ultimate symbol of hope, opportunity and escape: hope for the aged looking for a nice climate in which to retire; opportunity for those on the make; sunny escape for the beautiful and the indolent. But now, as the nation looks to this region for clues to the American future, utopian hopes have turned into cautionary tales.

headline.main: Nation's Land of Promise Enters an Era of Limits
